attributes.action: Privatise the Catering of both Houses of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Catering of both Houses of Parliament (Commons and Lords) costs the taxpayers of the U.K. Hundreds of thousends of a year.  Why, considering that Members of both Houses receive a good expences and allowances. Why should they (the Mebmbers be subsidised even more - as MacDonalds and Compass are both very professional companies why should they not be allowed to bid for the contract

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
